attributes.action:
Mobile Phone Control for 16 and under
 .
attributes.additional_details:
No mobile phones until you are 16. No Social media until you are 16. More phone boxes outside and inside schools for ringing in routine calls / emergency 
 .
attributes.background:
No mobile phones until you are 16. No Social media until you are 16. More phone boxes outside and inside schools for ringing in routine calls / emergency 
 .

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which call for similar actions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700086
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/714201
